metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Metroid Zero Mission - Norfair is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Metroid Zero Mission - Norfair has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Minor,  and D Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
